name: CYCLOPS SENTRY

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The cyclops makes two attacks, using Stone Club or Rock in any combination.

actions.name: Stone Club
actions.text: Melee Attack Roll: +9, reach 10 ft. Hit: 16 (3d6 + 6) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it has the Prone condition.

actions.name: Rock
actions.text: Ranged Attack Roll: +9, range 30/120 ft. Hit: 22 (3d10 + 6) Bludgeoning damage.

reactions.name: Limited Foresight (Recharge 6)
reactions.text: Trigger: A creature the cyclops can see makes an attack roll against it. Response: The cyclops imposes Disadvantage on the roll, and the cyclops gains Advantage on attack rolls against the target until the end of the cyclops's next turn.
